name: Baldi's Basics Field Trip Scratch Edition
name_original: Baldi's Basics Field Trip Scratch Edition
description:
It's a Scroll Map fangame of Baldi's Basics Field Trip made in scratch, but you have more characters and more (new items with an inventory system coming soon)!

Instructions

WASD = move

Space = run

To catch the sticks, touch, to play the sticks in the bonfire press F.

To blow away the Cloudy copter, touch.

=========================================

Objective: To get the sticks to the bonfire, if it does not go out, Baldi kills you.

Tips: Look the GPS to know what the characters location.

If you hear the "blow" of Cloudy Copter, go to fire.

Help in GPS:

Blue ball is you

Green Light Ball is Baldi

Green Dark Ball is Gotta Sweep

Orange Ball is Bully

Pink Ball is 0st Prize

White Ball is Cloudy Copter

Gray Ball is Arts Crafters

Red Ball is Playtime

Mrs Pomp is a ugly Woman

Yellow Ball is Pencil Boy

Pink ball is the Gum

Pink with Beige is the Beans

(The Test still don't have his icon on the GPS, and He will have not his icon, because he's a rare character for find him).

----------------------------

Instruções

WASD = mover

Space = run

Para pegar os gravetos, toque em, para tocá-los na fogueira, pressione F.

Para afastar o Cloudy Copter, toque em.

=========================================

Objetivo: Para levar os gravetos para a fogueira, se não apagar, Baldi o mata.

Dicas: Procure no GPS para saber qual é a localização dos caracteres.

Se você ouvir um "assopro" do Cloudy Copter, vá ao fogo.

Ajuda no GPS:

Bola azul é você

Bola verde clara é Baldi

A bola escura verde é Gotta Sweep

Orange Ball is Bully

Pink Ball é o 0º Prize

Bola branca é Cloudy Copter

Bola Cinza é Arts and crafters

Bola vermelha é Playtime

A Mrs Pomp é uma mulher feia

Bola amarela é Pencil Boy

A bola rosa é o chiclete

Rosa com bege é o Beans

(O teste ainda não tem seu ícone no GPS, e ele não terá seu ícone, porque ele é um personagem raro para encontrá-lo).

Update v10.3.8

Modification - Minor modifications to The Test.

Adjustment - Now you can see Beans walking, because it's almost impossible to see him walking, he has 0.5 seconds before he starts running.

Adjustment - Cloudy Copter's blowing sound has been increased to make it easier to be present.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
